bibl.title: Two Architectural Terms: σκούτλωσις and στιβάς in an Inscription from Marina el-Alamein (With an Appendix: Inscription on a Frying-pan).
bibl.note: Fragments of a marble inscription commemorating the completion of some works of architectural-decorative character, 180-191 A.D. - Pp. 65-66: Appendix: Inscription on a frying-pan, Roman Imperial period.
bibl.seg: LAJTAR Adam, Two Architectural Terms: σκούτλωσις and στιβάς in an Inscription from Marina el-Alamein (With an Appendix: Inscription on a Frying-pan).

Fragments of a marble inscription commemorating the completion of some works of architectural-decorative character, 180-191 A.D. - Pp. 65-66: Appendix: Inscription on a frying-pan, Roman Imperial period.
